alert.note: Alert for Christian; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 7:12PM EDT until March 30 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Christian County in south central Kentucky... Eastern Trigg County in western Kentucky... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 612 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Big Rock, or near Dover, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hopkinsville and Crofton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 62 and 81. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 1 and 25. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for western, south central and northwestern Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for western, south central and northwestern Kentucky.
